faq1.a: Each passenger is allowed one carry-on bag and one checked bag. Please refer to our policies for more details on size and weight restrictions.

faq2.a: You can check in online through our website or mobile app, or at the airport check-in counter.

faq3.q: What should I do if I miss my flight?
faq3.a: If you miss your flight, please contact our staff at the airport for assistance. Depending on the situation, we may be able to reschedule your flight without additional charges.

faq4.a: Yes, you can change your reservation subject to availability and additional fees. We recommend that you review our change policies before making any modifications.

faq5.q: What should I do if I have an additional question?
faq5.a: If you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team. We are here to assist you with anything you need.
